name: Popcorn Chicken Poutine

ingredients.name: Southern Baked Gluten Free Crumb Mix
Sea Salt
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or 1 tbsp dip mix, your choice

ingredients.name: your favourite Nutritional Yeast or Whole Food Topper

preparation: Preheat oven to 400 Â°F. Cut potatoes into fry-shaped pieces. Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Drizzle with oil and lightly toss using a Grip & Grab. Sprinkle with seasoning, to taste, if desired.
Bake for 40 min or until crispy. Add chicken bites for the last 10 min of baking.
Place in bowls. Drizzle with gravy and crumble cheese on top. Sprinkle with topper blend.
tips: Try skinny shoe-string fries using the 4-in-1 Mandoline for easy slicing.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup dark leafy greens and 1 cup mixed veggies with 1 Tbsp Epicure Salad Dressing.

products.name: SPG Seasoning
summary: Salt. Pepper. Garlic. Your go-to for chicken, fish, seafood, roasted potatoes, veggies, & even popcorn!
